pages.text: There are lots of liquids available to you, all of which you will need to become the master of Assembly Line Machines.$(p)For more information on the Pump and the Dowsing mechanic, please view $(l:age3)The Electrical Age.

pages.title: Oil
pages.text: Oil is a rare liquid found by dowsing in the Overworld.$(p)This liquid can be processed into $(l:age3)Plastic and Rubber,$() or processed into Diesel and Gasoline for $(l:blocks/generators)Power Generation.

pages.title: Naphtha
pages.text: Naphtha is found very rarely by dowsing in The Nether.$(br)This super-hot liquid is dangerous, but very useful for late-game crafting and fuelling the $(item)Naphtha Turbine.$()$(p)$(c)Be careful putting it down, as it spreads superhot Naphtha Fire that will never stop burning!

pages.title: Glacier Water
pages.text: Glacier Water is found by dowsing and pumping it out of $(1)very cold Overworld biomes.$() Thanks to its frigid properties, it might make for a phenomenal coolant, but look out: Its sub-arctic temperatures will very quickly freeze around it and create Powder Snow.

pages.title: Condensed Void
pages.text: Condensed Void is extremely unstable, and is found by dowsing in The End.$(br)This violent liquid is deadly, destructive, and unpleasant once placed. It will break down all Stone and completely destroy all natural materials.$(p)$(c)Use at your own risk.

Not much is known about $(k)Corrupted Shard, $()but word on the street is it is made by tossing an item into Condensed Void. The item will be irreversibly corrupted, but in some ways, it almost seems like it maintains the properties of the original item...
